member.summary: Contains information about a DNS Question

member.name: T:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver
member.summary:
DNS resolver, as defined in:
RFC 1034: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1034: DOMAIN NAMES - CONCEPTS AND FACILITIES RFC 1035: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc1035: DOMAIN NAMES - IMPLEMENTATION AND SPECIFICATION RFC 2782: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc2782: A DNS RR for specifying the location of services (DNS SRV) RFC 3596: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc3596: DNS Extensions to Support IP Version 6 RFC 5782: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc5782: DNS Blacklists and Whitelists RFC 7208: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7208: Sender Policy Framework (SPF) for Authorizing Use of Domains in Email, Version 1 RFC 8484: https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc8484: DNS Queries over HTTPS (DoH)

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.DnsOverHttpsUri
member.summary: URI used in DNS over HTTPS (DoH) requests. Setting the property to null disables DNS over HTTPS (DoH).

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.IsValidArpanetHostName(System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a host name is a valid ARPHANET host name.
member.returns: If is a valid ARPHANET host name.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.Resolve(System.String,Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.QTYPE,Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.QCLASS)
member.exception: If the domain name could not be resolved for the TYPE and CLASS provided.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.Resolve(System.String,Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.QTYPE,System.Nullable{Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.TYPE},Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.QCLASS)
member.param: If no answer of type is found, records of this type can also be accepted.
member.exception: If the domain name could not be resolved for the TYPE and CLASS provided.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupIP4Addresses(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up the IPv4 addresses related to a given domain name.
member.returns: IPv4 address found related to the domain name.
member.exception: If the name does not exist.
If the name could not be resolved.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupIP6Addresses(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up the IPv6 addresses related to a given domain name.
member.returns: IPv6 address found related to the domain name.
member.exception: If the name does not exist.
If the name could not be resolved.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupMailExchange(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up the Mail Exchanges related to a given domain name.
member.returns: Mail Exchanges found related to the domain name.
member.exception: If the name does not exist.
If the name could not be resolved.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.AddressToName(System.Net.IPAddress,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Converts an IP Address to a domain name for reverse IP lookup, or DNSBL lookup.
member.exception: If Address Type does not have a corresponding domain name.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupDomainName(System.Net.IPAddress)
member.summary:
Looks up the domain name pointing to a specific IP address.
Note: The response is not necessarily unique or authoritative.
member.returns: Domain Name pointing to the address

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupText(System.String)
member.summary: Looks up text (TXT) records for a name.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupBlackList(System.Net.IPAddress,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up an IP Address in a DNS Block List.
member.returns: null, if IP Address is NOT on list. Otherwise, it contains the reasons why it is on the list.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupServiceEndpoint(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up a service endpoint for a domain. If multiple are available, an appropriate one is selected as defined by RFC 2782.
member.exception: If service endpoint could not be resolved.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.LookupServiceEndpoints(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Looks up a available service endpoints for a domain.
member.exception: If service endpoint could not be resolved.

member.name: M:Waher.Networking.DNS.DnsResolver.Next(System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a non-negative random integer that is less than the specified maximum.
member.param: The exclusive upper bound of the random number to be generated. maxValue must be greater than or equal to 0.

member.summary: the canonical name for an alias

member.summary: A request for mailbox-related records (MB, MG or MR)

member.summary: A request for mail agent RRs (Obsolete - see MX)

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.RCode.YXDomain
member.summary: Name Exists when it should not [RFC2136] [RFC6672]

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.RCode.YXRRSet
member.summary: RR Set Exists when it should not [RFC2136]

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.RCode.NXRRSet
member.summary: RR Set that should exist does not [RFC2136]

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.RCode.NotAuth
member.summary: Server Not Authoritative for zone [RFC2136] Not Authorized [RFC2845]

member.name: F:Waher.Networking.DNS.Enumerations.RCode.BADVERS
member.summary: Bad OPT Version [RFC6891] TSIG Signature Failure [RFC2845]

member.summary: TYPE fields are used in resource records.

member.summary: the canonical name for an alias

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.DNS.ResourceRecords.MINFO.RMailBx
member.summary: Specifies a mailbox which is responsible for the mailing list or mailbox.

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.DNS.ResourceRecords.MINFO.EMailBx
member.summary: Specifies a mailbox which is to receive error messages related to the mailing list or mailbox specified by the owner of the MINFO RR(similar to the ERRORS-TO: field which has been proposed).

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.DNS.ResourceRecords.MX.Preference
member.summary: Preference given to this RR among others at the same owner.Lower values are preferred.

member.name: P:Waher.Networking.DNS.ResourceRecords.MX.Exchange
member.summary: Specifies a host willing to act as a mail exchange for the owner name

member.summary: Name server that was the original or primary source of data for this zone

member.summary: Version number of the original copy of the zone.

member.summary: Time interval before the zone should be refreshed

member.summary: Interval that should elapse before a failed refresh should be retried

member.summary: Specifies the upper limit on the time interval that can elapse before the zone is no longer authoritative

member.summary: Minimum TTL field that should be exported with any RR from this zone
